highlights: Communicated effectively with staff and volunteers to address maintenance needs and tasks effectively
Engaged in routine cleaning tasks, including wiping down tables and sanitizing surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene standards during the pandemic
Contributed to the upkeep of the environment by promptly picking up trash and watering plants to maintain a tidy and welcoming space

projects.name: FitCheck Project
projects.description: Developed a college group database project, an online platform enabling users to monitor their activities via a functional login system linked to a hosted database. Leveraging Replit as the hosting and collaborative service, with MySQL and phpAdmin employed to manage the database

projects.name: Online Portfolio
projects.description: In addition to my resume, I maintain an updated online portfolio featuring my latest projects and contact information. Feel free to explore my portfolio to view my skills and accomplishments!
Developed an applied statistics project centered around descriptive and inferential statistics, analyzing video game sales data up to 2020 utilizing the R language
projects.name: Using R to Analyze VGSales
DFSM + CFG Simulator
projects.description: Designed and implemented an automata project to simulate a deterministic finite state machine (DFSM) and Context Free Grammar (CFG) using a user-generated text file defining the alphabet. The project verifies the validity of input strings against the specified alphabet and simplify grammar

projects.name: Crypto Capitalist Game
projects.description: For my AP Computer Science final project, I developed a Clicker Game using Code.org's App Lab and JavaScript. This project was part of the explore assignment, allowing me to apply the concepts learned in class to create an interactive and clicker game

awards.title: Society of Hispanic Professions in Engineering (SHPE)
